fields.name: Sestina (Passive):
fields.value: Each time a noun present in one of your responses occurs again in another of your responses, gain 0.05x attack power. You only gain the attack power if the response the word reoccurs in places in the top half.

fields.name: Extra Line (0x, 75%):
fields.value: Use during day or the responding period of evening. This can be multitasked. This evening, you can submit an anonymous dummy. Your main response is the one counted for charge and power, but your dummy additionally counts for your other abilitiesâ€™ word requirements. If you have more than one ammo at one time, you can use as many at once as you want.

fields.name: Couplet:
fields.value: Choose a target, a response of theirs from any round, and a response of yours from any round. If the last word of your responses rhyme, you will attack them with your attack power. Slant rhymes are host discretion.

fields.name: Anthology (1x):
fields.value: Use during evening. At the beginning of the night, receive a randomly rolled list of non-locked, non-passive abilities belonging to town killing roles, equal in quantity to the number of the current day (Day 3 = Three random abilities). You may use one of the listed abilities tonight.
